scripts.create-events:backup: npm run backup && mv site-data.json indesign-csv/for-event-list.json
scripts.create-events:friday: node transforms/index.js indesign-csv/for-event-list.json friday-event-list friday-event-list.json && json2csv -b -i friday-event-list.json -o indesign-csv/friday-event-list.csv && iconv -f utf-8 -t utf-16 < indesign-csv/friday-event-list.csv > indesign-csv/friday-event-list-utf16.csv
scripts.create-events:saturday: node transforms/index.js indesign-csv/for-event-list.json saturday-event-list saturday-event-list.json && json2csv -b -i saturday-event-list.json -o indesign-csv/saturday-event-list.csv && iconv -f utf-8 -t utf-16 < indesign-csv/saturday-event-list.csv > indesign-csv/saturday-event-list-utf16.csv
scripts.create-events:sunday: node transforms/index.js indesign-csv/for-event-list.json sunday-event-list sunday-event-list.json && json2csv -b -i sunday-event-list.json -o indesign-csv/sunday-event-list.csv && iconv -f utf-8 -t utf-16 < indesign-csv/sunday-event-list.csv > indesign-csv/sunday-event-list-utf16.csv
scripts.create-events:all-days: npm run create-events:friday && npm run create-events:saturday && npm run create-events:sunday
scripts.create-events-csv: mkdir -p indesign-csv && npm run create-events:backup && npm run create-events:all-days && npm run create-events:clean
